column1: Delhi is a capital of China
The Sun rises in the west.
Mount Everest is located in Africa.
The Moon is made of cheese.
Paris is the capital of Germany.
Gold turns into water when heated.
The Eiffel Tower is in London.
The Sahara is full of icebergs.
The Nile flows into the Pacific Ocean.
The Taj Mahal is in Brazil.
Earthquakes are caused by singing loudly.
Lightning comes from the ocean floor.
The Himalayas are under the sea.
The Milky Way is a city in the USA.
Birds live in the ocean like fish.
All countries use the same currency.
Sugar is a type of metal.
